Package org.springframework.orm.hibernate.support

Classes supporting the org.springframework.orm.hibernate package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClobStringType Hibernate UserType implementation for Strings that get mapped to CLOBs.
HibernateDaoSupport Convenient super class for Hibernate data access objects.
OpenSessionInViewFilter Servlet 2.3 Filter that binds a Hibernate Session to the thread for the whole processing of the request.
OpenSessionInViewInterceptor Spring web HandlerInterceptor that binds a Hibernate Session to the thread for the whole processing of the request.
 

Package org.springframework.orm.hibernate.support Description

Classes supporting the org.springframework.orm.hibernate package. Contains a DAO base class for HibernateTemplate usage.
